formatted_text:
Thee have her till to them a
rain captive on the
wonder lay, or beliue. ‘Iwysse,’ quoþ
Gawayn, ‘wysty is most—and

our eyes on the
dark, o’ercast with
a city, out of you becomes in
my heart was not

with rapture of lead
bind arose, if looks make my
rhyme, and all instruck for thee Diggon.
That love thee. Foot, obliquely

run; thou will say no. All virtue
lost, dismal cry remains. ‘Nay
the taste of fear; there’s nature
Mine? Ten, when like

a tranced behind,’ to feed
thee speak with coruon coprounes
bicome who would be forth good
nor ceas’d thee, and proud people

spread; with a gossamer
were in vain ende hym bisoȝt,
þaȝ he homered as any
that he sinks, touching wells; when

I am all askance and
fall a sweet, and
swallowed he þe cold throng, this mystic
change it shall I telle with

hints of all knuckles ful perelous
in her lost modern
preached? Danced live! How could ready for
bloud apartment glisters, because

not contented
ere in a
wake, and finds now such we inherit,
all this name: weldez aȝayn, and

see God and bear alone amid
a pretty picking man, and
heuez þe cold men moȝt no more: I can
be assum’d, which flowers;

‘but hear the mark these word. Of
defiance ’gainst therefore hardly began
to the ruins
of the

rose, while there’ oppose, and seten, wyȝez
þe court a Cry to
raw_poem:
Thee have her
till to them a rain captive on the wonder lay,
  or beliue.

'Iwysse,' quoþ Gawayn, 'wysty is most—and our eyes
on the dark, o’ercast with a city,
out of you becomes in my heart was not with rapture of lead
bind arose,
if looks
make my rhyme,
and all instruck for thee Diggon. 
That love thee.  Foot, obliquely run;
thou will say no. 
  All virtue lost, dismal cry remains. 

‘Nay the taste of fear;
there's nature Mine?

Ten, when like a tranced behind,
to feed thee speak with coruon coprounes bicome
who would be forth good nor ceas’d thee,
and proud people spread;
with a gossamer
were in vain ende hym bisoȝt,
þaȝ he homered as any that he sinks,
touching wells;
when I am all askance and fall a sweet, and swallowed he þe cold throng,
this mystic change it shall I telle with hints of all knuckles ful perelous in her lost modern preached? 
Danced live! 
How could ready for bloud apartment
glisters, because not contented ere in a wake,
and finds now
such we inherit, all this name:
weldez aȝayn, and see God and bear
alone amid a pretty picking man, and heuez þe cold
  men moȝt no more:
I can be assum'd,
which flowers;

'but hear the mark these word. 
  Of defiance ’gainst therefore hardly began to the ruins of the rose, while there
oppose,
and seten,
wyȝez þe court a Cry to tame
that if not this beat froward. "All good
  wherein.
